alert.note: Alert for Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 16 at 7:10PM CDT until September 16 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR WESTERN LOGAN AND EASTERN MCPHERSON COUNTIES... At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ringgold, or near Tryon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tryon and Ringgold. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 199 and 227. Highway 97 between mile markers 21 and 38. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
